text: tamanṭama aparādha kara gattavun lesa siṭiya dī ovun va malakvaru maraṇayaṭa pat karana viṭa “num̆balā kavara tattvayaka siṭiyehu dæ” yi vimasati. eviṭa “mahapoḷovē api dubalayin lesa siṭiyemu” yæyi ovuhu pavasati. “allāhgē mahapoḷova vyāpta vūvak lesa notibuṇēda? eheyin num̆balā ehi saṁkramaṇaya vīmaṭa tibuṇi” yæyi pavasati. movun pivisena sthānaya niraya vē. eya navātænin itā napuruya
